title: Arumukhan sIraDiyai
sahitya:
Arumukha sIraDiyai sEruvOrin tuyar tIrum


anupallavi

  pAril ta aDiyAraip-pAlittaruL kUravE ArupaDai vIDamarum kAruNya sIruDaiyOn


caraNam    vAri mOdik-karai sErat-tAvum tirai kaDal Oram urayak-kuDiyEri OyAmal tannaruLai
kOrip-pera nADik-kUDum pArinOr uyyumAru pEraruLai vArittarum pugazhODu tigazhvOn
